廟.definition: temple; ancestral shrine; CL:座[zuo4]; temple fair; great imperial hall; imperial

廟口.definition: Miaokou, market district in Keelung, Taiwan

廟堂.definition: imperial ancestral temple; imperial court; temple

廟祝.definition: acolyte in charge of incense in a temple

廟號.definition: temple name of a deceased Chinese emperor
